Detailed Description

template<class Archive, class Elem, class Tr>
class boost::archive::basic_binary_oprimitive< Archive, Elem, Tr >

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// class basic_binary_oprimitive - binary output of prmitives archives stored as native binary - this should be the fastest way to archive the state of a group of obects. It makes no attempt to convert to any canonical form.

IN GENERAL, ARCHIVES CREATED WITH THIS CLASS WILL NOT BE READABLE ON PLATFORM APART FROM THE ONE THEY ARE CREATE ON
